body.p: The Affidavit of Lee Anderson Shows that he Nor A R Boon who were the sureties of W P Miller (a free man of Color) for his appearance in the McCracken circuit Court to answer an indictment agst him for migrating, have either of them directly or indirectly ever recd one cente in money or profits or other thing to indemnify them as sureties of said Miller --
Subscribed and Sworn to before me by Lee Anderson, Aug 25/ 65

P D Yeiser N P M C C
P, D, Y
N P
Aug 25/65
